An PHGServerCon Class

BrAPI connection validation
PHGServerCon()
PHGServerCon object constructor
brapiURL()
Return URL path
brapiVersion()
Return BrAPI version ID
buildHaplotypeGraph()
Helper function to build HaplotypeGraph object
calcMutualInfo()
Calculate mutual information for a given PHG data set
configFilePath()
Return file path of configuration file
dbName()
Return name of DB
dbType()
Return type of DB
gvcfMetrics()
Generate metrics for GVCF data
host()
Return host data
httProtocol()
Return protocol value
isDemo()
Return demo state
javaMemoryAddress()
Return rJava reference object
javaRefObj()
Return rJava reference object
json2tibble()
JSON to tibble converter
numHaploPerRefRange()
Return number of haplotypes per reference range
numberOfChromosomes()
Return number of chromosomes
numberOfNodes()
Return number of nodes
numberOfRefRanges()
Return number of reference ranges
numberOfTaxa()
Return number of taxa
phgConObj()
Return a PHG connection object
phgMethodId()
Return method ID
phgMethodType()
Return method ID type
phgType()
Return type of PHG connection
plotDot()
Generate dot plot from Anchor files
plotGraph()
Plot a graph object
plotMutualInfo()
Plot mutual information
port()
Return port value
readHaplotypeIds()
Return haplotype IDs

Return a PHGDataSet
readRefRanges()
Return reference ranges
readSamples()
Return samples IDs
serverInfo()
Return server information
show(<PHGMethod>)
Show method for PHGMethod objects
showPHGMethods()
Return available PHG methods
startLogger()
Start PHG logging information
taxaByNode()
Return taxa info for haplotype IDs
